items.sentence: The twin girls are so much alike that I can\'t tell one from the other.
I still haven\'t thanked you for the other day. I really appreciate it.
Why don\'t you do us all a favor and go back to wherever you came from?
You could at least pretend to be interested in what I\'m talking about.
It looks like you were right. Tom was the guy who stole Mary\'s violin.
Excuse me, could you spare me a few minutes? I have a favor to ask you.
I always enjoy listening to classical music when I have some free time.
I came over here to tell you guys that you need to be a little quieter.
If I remember correctly, Tom sold his car to Mary for just 500 dollars.
My brother Tom is older than me, but all my other brothers are younger.
